trans-unit.source: A composite activity that contains a collection of event handlers.
trans-unit.target: Una actividad compuesta que contiene una colección de controladores de eventos.

trans-unit.source: It is typically used where a collection of events must be handled.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente se usa donde deba administrarse una colección de eventos.

trans-unit.source: Each event is handled by one <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity" />, which is part of <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.EventHandlersActivity" />.
trans-unit.target: Un <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity" />, que forma parte de <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.EventHandlersActivity" /> administra cada evento.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventHandlersActivity> activity holds a set of <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity> classes, for use by the associated <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity>.
trans-unit.target: La actividad <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventHandlersActivity> contiene un conjunto de clases <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity>, para usarlo con el <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity> asociado.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventHandlersActivity> activity can only be associated with an <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventHandlingScopeActivity>.
trans-unit.target: Una actividad <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventHandlersActivity> sólo puede estar asociada a un <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventHandlingScopeActivity>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventHandlersActivity> activity is a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity>, meaning the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventHandlersActivity> activity can contain other activities.
trans-unit.target: La actividad <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventHandlersActivity> es una clase <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity>, lo que significa que la actividad <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventHandlersActivity> puede contener otras actividades.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.EventHandlersActivity" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa una nueva instancia de la clase <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.EventHandlersActivity" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.EventHandlersActivity" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa una nueva instancia de la clase <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.EventHandlersActivity" />.

trans-unit.source: The user-defined name of the activity.
trans-unit.target: Nombre de la actividad definido por el usuario.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.EventHandlersActivity" /> class by using the name of the activity.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa una nueva instancia de la clase <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.EventHandlersActivity" /> con el nombre de la actividad.

trans-unit.source: Gets the currently executing instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene la instancia de la <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity" /> que se está ejecutando actualmente.

trans-unit.source: The currently executing instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity" />.
trans-unit.target: Instancia de la <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity" /> que se está ejecutando actualmente.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="childactivity" /> is a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="childactivity" /> es una referencia nula (<see langword="Nothing" /> en Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: The executable activities do not contain the <paramref name="childactivity" />.
trans-unit.target: Las actividades ejecutables no contienen <paramref name="childactivity" />.

trans-unit.source: The object that raised the event.
trans-unit.target: El objeto que ha generado el evento.
Los argumentos de evento con tipo anteriores.

trans-unit.source: Defines the processing procedure when the subscribed-to event occurs.
trans-unit.target: Define el procedimiento de procesamiento cuando se produce el evento subscrito.
